lines.gurmukhi: jYsy nIr KIr AMn Bojn Kuvwie AMiq; gro kwit mwrq hY Ajw sÍwn kau [

Unknown.translation: Just as a male off-spring of a goat, (a he-goat) is brought up by feeding him with milk and food, and at last he is killed by cutting his neck.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ CotI ijhI byVI ivc bhuqw Bwr pw dyeIey qwˆ auh mMJDwr ivc hI fub jwˆdI hY qy pwr nhIˆ phuMcdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bhu Bwr fwrIAq lGu nOkw mwih; bUfq hY mwJDwr pwr n gvn kau [

Unknown.translation: Just as a small boat is loaded with excessive baggage, then it sinks in the middle of a river where the water is more turbulent. It cannot reach the far bank.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ CotI ijhI byVI ivc bhuqw Bwr pw deIey qwˆ auh mMJDwr ivc hI fu`b jwˆdI hY qy pwr nhIˆ phuMcdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bur nwir, Dwir Brn isMgwr qin; Awip AwmY Arpq icMqw kY Bvn kau [

Unknown.translation: Just as a prostitute adorns herself with make up and ornaments to excite other males for indulging in vices with her, she herself acquires disease and worry in life.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ mwVI iesqrI, srIr qy pihn ky iSMgwr qy gihxy pwp krm kr ky Awpxy Awp nUM rog dy Arpn krdI qy icMqw dy Gr ivc pY jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI ADrm krm kY ADrm nr; mrq Akwl jmlokih rvn kau [636[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, an immoral person dies before his death by indulging in unrighteous deeds. And when he reaches Yamlok (abode of angels of death), he bears more punishment and pain.  (636)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ durwcwrI mnu`K Drm ivroDI kMm kr ky AixAweI mOqy mrdw qy jmlok nUM jwˆdw hY ]636]
